IMPORTANT Deprecated The Range.compareNode() returns a constant indicating the
position of the .

blockquote.para:
Warning: This method has been removed from Gecko 1.9 and
will not exist in future versions of Firefox, which was the only browser implementing
it; you should switch to as soon as
possible.

remarks.para: The following function can be used as replacement:

RangeCompareNode.returns: A constant indicating the position of the .
